abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32543763, pmid32530526, pmid32525227, pmid32531146, pmid32556079, pmid32562479, pmid32555138, pmid32529906, pmid32510978, pmid32540034, pmid32529918, pmid32544437, pmid32537480, pmid32543196, pmid32512578, pmid32531040, pmid32544254, pmid32538597, pmid32558210, pmid32543722, pmid32532753, pmid32543353, pmid32542349, pmid32511260, pmid32544145, pmid32538638, pmid32552622, pmid32525853, pmid32553344, pmid32542488
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.23
